about_the_game:
In this game, Familiar: Battle of the Labyrinth, you will embark on a treacherous journey through a large and mysterious labyrinth. You will need to summon all the familiars you have to fight a large number of powerful creatures that guard the labyrinth's secrets. Your goal in the labyrinth is to find what lies at the end by fighting through automated battles during which you strategize the best way to defeat your enemies. As you travel through the game, you will find more familiars to fight by your side in battle. In addition, you will have the chance to explore new and interesting locations and find collectibles rare and unique to bring back with you. Do you think you will be able to figure out the secret at the end? or will your story end here, and be forever forgotten?

Will you survive the Labyrith?



  • Collectibles
  • Randomly generated battles
  • Replayability
  • Type based battle mechanics



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.

name: Familiar - Battle of the Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: An autobattler where you traverse a mysterious labyrinth. Summoning familiars to fight enemies and finding collectables along the way, as you delve deeper to find what lies at the end.
